name: oj-collapsible
description: Displays a header that can be expanded to show its content.

disabled.description: Disables the collapsible if set to true.

expandArea.description: Where in the header to click to toggle disclosure.

disclosureIcon.description: click the disclosureIcon to toggle disclosure

header.description: click any where in the header to toggle disclosure

expanded.description: Specifies if the content is expanded.

translations.description: A collection of translated resources from the translation bundle, or null if this component has no resources.

refresh.description:
Refreshes the visual state of the collapsible.

This method does not accept any arguments.

setProperty.description: Sets a property or a single subproperty for complex properties and notifies the component of the change, triggering a [property]Changed event.

params.name: property
params.description: The property name to set. Supports dot notation for subproperty access.

params.name: value
params.description: The new value to set the property to.

getProperty.description: Retrieves a value for a property or a single subproperty for complex properties.

params.name: property
params.description: The property name to get. Supports dot notation for subproperty access.

setProperties.description: Performs a batch set of properties.

params.name: properties
params.description: An object containing the property and value pairs to set.

ojBeforeExpand.description: Triggered immediately before the collapsible is expanded.

header.description: The header that is about to be expanded.

content.description: The content that is about to be expanded.

ojExpand.description: Triggered immediately after the collapsible is expanded.

header.description: The header that was just expanded.

content.description: The content that was just expanded.

ojBeforeCollapse.description: Triggered immediately before the collapsible is collapsed.

header.description: The header that is about to be collapsed.

content.description: The content that is about to be collapsed.

ojCollapse.description: Triggered immediately after the collapsible is collapsed.

header.description: The header that was just collapsed.

content.description: The content that was just collapsed.

slots.description: The default slot is the collapsible's content.

contextMenu.description: The contextMenu slot is set on the <oj-menu> instance within this element. It designates the JET Menu that this component should launch as a context menu.

header.description: The header slot is the collapsible's header. If not specified, the header contains only an open/close icon. Note that the header text is required for JET collapsible for accessibility purposes.
